name: Suspect Interview Methods
description: Techniques for interrogating suspects to extract reliable and legally admissible confessions.

cards.title: Reid Technique & Psychological Pressure
cards.description: Applying structured interrogation tactics to elicit truthful statements.
bulletpoints: Analyze suspect body language and microexpressions
Differentiate between truthful responses and deceptive tactics
cards.summaryText: Guide structured interrogations that read cues and pressure out truthful accounts.

cards.title: Cognitive Interviewing for Witnesses & Suspects
cards.description: Enhancing memory recall and extracting key details from subjects.
bulletpoints: Use visualization and recall techniques to reconstruct crime events
Minimize leading questions to maintain accuracy
Adapt interview strategies based on suspect or witness psychology
cards.summaryText: Use cognitive prompts and neutral phrasing to unlock detailed, reliable memories.
